content: this hat knits-up quickly which makes it a great gift giving project adding decorative buttons or a pompom looks really cute and customizes the hat two options are available for the brim single or double for the double-brim option the sts are cast-on provisionally and the picked-up after knitting the brim and knitted together with the working sts to use bigger or smaller yarn just change the stitch count by +/- 12 sts increments jan 8th updated the pattern to correct errors in written crown instructions
